file_content.text: I hope it works. You can't imagine how great this place used to be.
I'm here to pick up the recordings you have for Dooce Everton.
You want to spray paint that on the walls or anything? Little discretion, here!
Tell Dooce it's just what he asked for. Enough for the Republic to make arrests, Black Sun, the real stuff. Hope they can make it stick.
This is Coruscant... you shouldn't have to be afraid for your life just because you get off the wrong elevator.
